short_summary: The RCMP is looking for a Propane Engine Driven Forklift Truck. Interested suppliers can only be the ones holding a supply arrangement under the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).
description: This bid solicitation is for a Propane Engine Driven Forklift Truck. The requested delivery date is 1st of October 2024. Interested suppliers must provide the goods by this date.
duration_in_months: user SET REQUIRED FOR PROFESSIONAL WORK Product Category UNSPSC UNSPSC Description
full_summary:
Marché à Conecurrences/Procurement
Title/Titre: Propane Engine Driven Forklift Truck/Chariot élévateur à fourche au propane

**Reference Number/Numéro de référence**: cb-989-69637171

 Announcement of Invitation to Bid/ Appel d'offres
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) / La Gendarmerie royale du Canada a besoin d’un (1) fournisseur de Propane Engine Driven Forklift Truck/Un Chariot élévateur à fourche au propane.

Bidders/Offrant(e)s must have a Supply Arrangement (SA) under the Request (RFSA) E60HS-21FRKL/A to be eligible. Interested suppliers are invited to download the RFSA from [https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868](https://buyandsell.gc.ca/procurement-data/tender-notice/PW-HS-653-79868). Please note that suppliers must ensure their AMA is valid and up-to-date at the time of bidding.

**Invitation to Bid Details/ Informations sur demande de soumissions**
Solicitation Number/ Numéro de sollicitation: 202402070B
Publication Date/Date de publication: 2024-04-25
Tender Closing Date/Appel d’offres Date Clôture: 2024-05-10 14:00:00
Delivery Date/Date de livraison: 2024-10-01

**Evaluation and Award Criteria/ Criteria d’évaluation et de sélection**
The Invitation to Bid will be evaluated based on the lowest price submitted.

**Notice Type/Type d’avis**
The Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) has issued a request for proposal for the procurement of Propane Engine Driven Forklift Truck/Chariot élévateur à fourche au propane.

**Procurement Details/ Informations sur approvisionnement**
Procurement Category/Catégorie d’approvisionnement: Goods (GD)
Solicited by/ Rémis à: Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP)
 

**Expression of Interest/Confidentialité**
The bidding process for this Invitation to Bid will be open and competitive.  The RCMP may request and receive sealed bids from potential bidders who meet the eligibilty requirements outlined above. Suppliers are encouraged to express their interest by competing in the bid process.

**Bid Evaluation
